original_text: Then the soldiers' leader told two of his officers to come to him. He said to them, ‘Tell 200 of our soldiers to prepare themselves. They must go to Caesarea at nine o'clock tonight. 70 soldiers who ride on horses must also go. There must also be another 200 soldiers with their weapons.
korean_text: 백부장 둘을 불러 이르되 밤 제 삼 시에 가이사랴까지 갈 보병 이백 명과 기병 칠십 명과 창병 이백 명을 준비하라 하고

sentences.original_text: Then the soldiers' leader told two of his officers
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 군대 지도자가 그의 장교 두 명에게 명령했습니다

sentences.original_text: Tell 200 of our soldiers to prepare themselves
They must go to Caesarea at nine o'clock tonight
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 오늘 밤 9시에 가이사랴로 가야 한다

sentences.original_text: 70 soldiers who ride on horses must also go
sentences.korean_translation: 말을 타는 군사 70명도 함께 가야 한다

sentences.original_text: There must also be another 200 soldiers
